note: Ontwerper, neerlandicus, bassist, (tenor-)gitarist, lezer, luisteraar. Offset Tinkerer. Introvert, maar best gezellig hoor. / Designer, studied Dutch language, bassist, (tenor) guitarist, reader, listener. Offset Tinkerer. Introverted, but quite gezellig.
